Follow the steps in Tailwind CLI:

1. Don't run npm install -D as we don't need it, just run the second command npx tailwind init.

2. In the tailwind config file inter the path of the html files on which tailwind css will be implemented

3. dist file contains all the files that will actually be rendered and in src file add all the tailwind directories

4. Run the last CLI command to use tailwind from src/input.css to a css file in the dist(dist/style.css) and link the css file in dist to the html file
